scripts.lint:js:fix: bash -lc 'if [ -z "$LINT_JS_FIX_RUNNING" ]; then export LINT_JS_FIX_RUNNING=1; echo "▶ Running ESLint --fix..."; eslint . --fix; npm run lint:js:report; else echo "⚠ ESLint fix already running, skipping to prevent loop"; fi'
scripts.lint:js:report: bash -lc 'mkdir -p dev/reports/eslint; echo "▶ Running ESLint..."; npx eslint . --format=json -o dev/reports/eslint/eslint-report.json || true; echo "▶ Formatting summary..."; bash dev/reports/summarize-eslint.sh; echo "✅ Done → dev/reports/eslint/eslint-report-format.txt"'
scripts.lint:php:fix: bash -lc 'if [ -z "$LINT_PHP_FIX_RUNNING" ]; then export LINT_PHP_FIX_RUNNING=1; echo "▶ Running PHPCBF..."; vendor/bin/phpcbf; npm run lint:php:report; else echo "⚠ PHPCBF already running, skipping to prevent loop"; fi'
scripts.lint:php:report: bash -lc 'mkdir -p dev/reports/phpcs; echo "▶ Running PHPCS..."; ./vendor/bin/phpcs --report=json -q . > dev/reports/phpcs/phpcs-report.json || true; echo "▶ Formatting summary..."; bash dev/reports/summarize-phpcs.sh; echo "✅ Done → dev/reports/phpcs/phpcs-report-format.txt"'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:php
scripts.lint:all:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:php:fix
scripts.lint:all:report: npm run lint:js:report && npm run lint:php:report
